trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Debug-Runspace
trans-unit.target: Debug-Runspace

trans-unit.source: Debug-Runspace
trans-unit.target: Debug-Runspace

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Starts an interactive debugging session with a runspace.
trans-unit.target: 啟動 runspace 的互動式偵錯工作階段。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: RunspaceParameterSet (Default)
trans-unit.target: RunspaceParameterSet （預設值）

trans-unit.source: NameParameterSet
trans-unit.target: NameParameterSet

trans-unit.source: IdParameterSet
trans-unit.target: IdParameterSet

trans-unit.source: InstanceIdParameterSet
trans-unit.target: InstanceIdParameterSet

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **Debug-Runspace** cmdlet starts an interactive debugging session with a local or remote active runspace.
trans-unit.target: **偵錯 Runspace** 指令程式可啟動的互動式偵錯工作階段與本機或遠端使用 runspace。

trans-unit.source: You can find a runspace that you want to debug by first running Get-Process to find processes associated with Windows PowerShell, then Enter-PSHostProcess with the process ID specified in the *Id* parameter to attach to the process, and then Get-Runspace to list runspaces within the Windows PowerShell host process.
trans-unit.target: 您可以找到您要尋找 Windows PowerShell 相關聯的處理程序的第一個執行 Get-process 所偵錯，然後輸入-PSHostProcess 處理序識別碼中指定的 runspace *識別碼* 參數清單 runspace，Windows PowerShell 主機處理序中要附加至處理程序，然後取得 Runspace。

trans-unit.source: After you have selected a runspace to debug, if the runspace is currently running a command or script, or if the script has stopped at a breakpoint, Windows PowerShell opens a remote debugger session for the runspace.
trans-unit.target: 如果 runspace 目前正在執行的命令或指令碼中，選取偵錯，runspace 之後或指令碼已在中斷點停止，Windows PowerShell 會開啟 runspace 的遠端偵錯工具工作階段。

trans-unit.source: You can debug the runspace script in the same way remote session scripts are debugged.
trans-unit.target: 您可以偵錯 runspace 指令碼，可在偵錯遠端工作階段的指令碼的方式相同。

trans-unit.source: You can only attach to a Windows PowerShell host process if you are an administrator on the computer that is running the process, or you are running the script that you want to debug.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是系統管理員執行此程序，在電腦上的，只能將其附加至 Windows PowerShell 主機處理序，或您正在執行您要偵錯指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Also, you cannot enter the host process that is running the current Windows PowerShell session; you can only enter a host process that is running a different Windows PowerShell session.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您無法輸入主機處理序正在執行目前的 Windows PowerShell 工作階段中。您可以只輸入主機處理序正在使用不同的 Windows PowerShell 工作階段。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are working in a PowerShell.exe session, you can't enter the host process for that session, but you can enter the host process of a running Windows PowerShell ISE session.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您使用 PowerShell.exe 工作階段中，您不能為該工作階段中，輸入主控件程序，但您可以輸入主機的程序執行的 Windows PowerShell ISE 工作階段。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Debug a remote runspace
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 偵錯遠端 runspace

trans-unit.source: In this example, you debug a runspace that is open on a remote computer, WS10TestServer.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，您將偵錯已開啟的遠端電腦上，WS10TestServer runspace。

trans-unit.source: The first command runs the Get-Process cmdlet on the remote computer, and then filters for Windows PowerShell host processes.
trans-unit.target: 第一個命令在遠端電腦上執行 Get-process cmdlet，並接著篩選 Windows PowerShell 主機處理程序。

trans-unit.source: The command debugs process ID 1152, the Windows PowerShell ISE host process.
trans-unit.target: 此命令偵錯處理序識別碼 1152，Windows PowerShell ISE 主機處理序。

trans-unit.source: The second command runs Enter-PSSession to open a remote session on WS10TestServer.
trans-unit.target: 第二個命令會執行 Enter-pssession 開啟 WS10TestServer 上的遠端工作階段。

trans-unit.source: The third command attaches to the Windows PowerShell ISE host process that runs on the remote server by running Enter-PSHostProcess, and specifies the ID of the host process that you obtained in the first command, 1152.
trans-unit.target: 第三個命令會將附加至 Windows PowerShell ISE 主機處理序執行遠端伺服器上執行 Enter PSHostProcess，和 1152年在第一個命令中，指定您取得主機處理序的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The fourth command lists available runspaces for process ID 1152 by using the Get-Runspace cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 第四個命令會列出處理序識別碼 1152年可用 runspace 使用 Get Runspace 指令程式。

trans-unit.source: You note the ID number of the Busy runspace; it is running a script that you want to debug.
trans-unit.target: 您注意忙碌的 runspace; 的 ID 編號它執行您要偵錯指令碼。

trans-unit.source: The firth command debugs an opened runspace that is running a script, TestWFVar1.ps1, by using the **Debug-Runspace** cmdlet, and identifies the runspace by its ID, 2, that uses the *Id* parameter.
trans-unit.target: Firth 命令進行偵錯使用執行指令碼，而 TestWFVar1.ps1，開啟的 runspace **偵錯 Runspace** 指令程式，並識別其 id，2，使用 runspace *識別碼* 參數。

trans-unit.source: Because there's a breakpoint in the script, the debugger opens.
trans-unit.target: 因為指令碼中的中斷點，偵錯工具隨即開啟。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。

trans-unit.source: -Id
trans-unit.target: 識別碼

trans-unit.source: Specifies the ID number of a runspace.
trans-unit.target: 指定 runspace 的 ID 編號。

trans-unit.source: You can run Get-Runspace to show runspace IDs.
trans-unit.target: 您可以執行 Get-Runspace，以顯示 runspace Id。

trans-unit.source: -InstanceId
trans-unit.target: -執行個體識別碼

trans-unit.source: Specifies a runspace by its instance ID, a GUID that you can show by running **Get-Runspace**.
trans-unit.target: 指定依執行個體識別碼，您可以藉由執行顯示 GUID runspace **Get Runspace**。

trans-unit.source: -Name
trans-unit.target: -Name

trans-unit.source: Specifies a runspace by its name.
trans-unit.target: 依據名稱指定 runspace。

trans-unit.source: You can run **Get-Runspace** to show the names of runspaces.
trans-unit.target: 您可以執行 **Get Runspace** 顯示 runspace 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: -Runspace
trans-unit.target: -Runspace

trans-unit.source: Specifies a runspace object.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 runspace 物件。

trans-unit.source: The simplest way to provide a value for this parameter is to specify a variable that contains the results of a filtered **Get-Runspace** command.
trans-unit.target: 最簡單的方式提供值，這個參數是指定的變數，其中包含已篩選的結果 **Get Runspace** 命令。

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 顯示執行 Cmdlet 後會發生的情況。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行此指令程式。顯示執行此指令程式會發生什麼事。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: 未執行 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: System.Management.Automation.Runspaces.Runspace
trans-unit.target: System.Management.Automation.Runspaces.Runspace

trans-unit.source: You can pipe the results of a **Get-Runspace** command to **Debug-Runspace.**
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用管線的結果 **Get Runspace** 命令 **偵錯 Runspace。**

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: **Debug-Runspace** works on runspaces that are in the Opened state.
trans-unit.target: **偵錯 Runspace** 從事 runspace 處於開啟狀態。

trans-unit.source: If a runspace state changes from Opened to another state, that runspace is automatically removed from the running list.
trans-unit.target: 從開啟的 runspace 狀態是另一個狀態變更，會自動會從執行中的清單移除該 runspace。

trans-unit.source: A runspace is added to the running list only if it meets the following criteria.
trans-unit.target: 只有在符合下列準則，runspace 會加入至執行中的清單。

trans-unit.source: If it is coming from Invoke-Command; that is, it has an **Invoke-Command** GUID ID.
trans-unit.target: 如果來自 Invoke-command;也就是具有 **Invoke-command** GUID 識別碼。

trans-unit.source: If it is coming from **Debug-Runspace**; that is, it has a **Debug-Runspace** GUID ID.
trans-unit.target: 如果來自 **偵錯 Runspace**; 也就是說，它有 **偵錯 Runspace** GUID 識別碼。

trans-unit.source: If it is coming from a Windows PowerShell workflow, and its workflow job ID is the same as the current active debugger workflow job ID.
trans-unit.target: 如果來自 Windows PowerShell 工作流程，而且它的工作流程的作業識別碼與目前的作用中的偵錯工具工作流程工作 ID 相同。

trans-unit.target: 相關的連結
